Review: pros outstanding design sturdy and water proofed bright oled screen hdr10 dolby vision dependable battery life loud stereo speakers excellent output unmatched performance 5g great all round photo and video quality across all three cameras cons minor upgrade over iphone 12 no 120hz refresh rate the notch is still an eyesore even if smaller the fast charging can be handled better ios with its limitations remains a love it or leave it affair
